| Scope 3 emissions methodology | ⚠️ Partial | Methodology described, but quantitative Scope 3 values are missing.
| Board diversity metrics | ✅ Met | Board composition percentages disclosed.
| Executive compensation linked to ESG metrics | ❌ Missing | No ESG‑linked compensation disclosed.
| Climate risk scenario analysis | ⚠️ Partial | Qualitative discussion present; no quantitative impact modeling.
| Supply chain ESG due diligence | ✅ Met | Supplier questionnaire and summary statistics included.
| Water usage and management | ✅ Met | Total water withdrawal reported.
